name: pangenome-graph
title: Pangenome Graph Construction (nf-core/pangenome)
description: Build pangenome graphs from multiple genome assemblies using PGGB tools. Constructs graph representations capturing genomic variation across multiple individuals or strains, enabling comprehensive variation analysis and comparative genomics.
content:
Pangenome Graph Construction

The nf-core/pangenome pipeline builds pangenome graphs from genome assemblies, representing genomic variation across populations as graph structures rather than linear references.

Scientific Applications

  • Population Genomics: Capture variation across populations
  • Comparative Genomics: Compare multiple strains or species
  • Structural Variation: Identify large genomic rearrangements
  • Reference Genomes: Build graph-based reference genomes
  • Haplotype Analysis: Study haplotype diversity

Key Features

  • All-versus-all genome alignment (WFMASH)
  • Graph construction and normalization
  • Visualization and statistics
  • Handles multiple haplotypes

Input Requirements

  • Bgzipped FASTA file with multiple genomes
  • Number of haplotypes

Perfect for: Population geneticists • Comparative genomics • Microbiologists studying bacterial diversity • Plant genomics
